/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a vibrant touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image appears to have been captured using a fisheye lens, which creates a circular distortion around the edges of the frame, adding an interesting visual element to the composition. The colors in the image are rich and natural, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a captivating glimpse into the cityscape of Beijing.
